hero.subtitle: Create games, tournaments and club events in seconds. Ticket sales included – fair and transparent.

cta.title: Ready to start your next event?

items.question: What is Wichty?
items.answer: Wichty is an intuitive event platform specifically designed for amateur sports and private events in Germany. Our goal is to make organizing events as simple as possible – without confusing WhatsApp groups or complex ticketing systems.

items.question: Who is Wichty for?
items.answer: Wichty is designed for anyone organizing events, especially: Amateur sports clubs (e.g., for tournaments, summer festivals, training camps), organizers of private events (e.g., birthdays, parties), coaches and treasurers who want to keep track of participants and payments.

items.question: How much does Wichty cost?
items.answer: We charge a service fee of 5% of the ticket price, with a minimum of €0.50 per ticket. As an organizer, you have the option to pass this fee on to the buyer.

items.question: What payment methods are supported?
items.answer: Wichty supports common online payment methods such as PayPal, credit card, and Apple Pay to provide your participants with a quick and easy checkout process.

items.question: How do I create an event on Wichty?
items.answer: Creating an event is incredibly easy and done in just a few minutes. Our platform is designed to be "radically simple" so you don't need any instructions.

items.question: Can I use Wichty for private celebrations?
items.answer: Yes, absolutely! Wichty is also great for organizing private events like birthdays or house parties.

items.question: Is there a mobile app?
items.answer: We're currently starting with a mobile-optimized web app that works on all devices. Native apps for iOS and Android are planned for the future.

items.question: What sets Wichty apart from other providers?
items.answer: Unlike complex and expensive systems like Eventbrite or Eventim-Light, we focus on radical simplicity and transparent, fair pricing. We want to make event organization accessible to everyone.
